CustomField.formula: Case(Industry, "Automotive",50, "Banking & Financial Services",100, "Consulting & Business Services",50, "Healthcare",25, "Insurance",100, "Life Sciences, Pharma, & Biotech",25, "Logistics & Transportation",75, "Manufacturing",50, "Public Sector, Government and Education",0, "Retail",50, "Software & Technology",100, "Telecommunications, Media & Entertainment",100, "Utilities",100, 0)
CustomField.label: Industry Score
